db:para.db:emphasis: This type is under development and is subject to change.

db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in Qt 5.0.

db:para.db:emphasis: This type is under development and is subject to change.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: It can be accessed through QtAudioEngine::AudioEngine::samples with its unique name and must be defined inside AudioEngine or be added to it using AudioEngine.addAudioSample() if AudioSample is created dynamically.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] loaded : bool
db:section.db:para: This property indicates whether this sample has been loaded into memory or not.

db:section.db:title: name : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the name of the sample, which must be unique among all samples and only defined once.

db:section.db:title: preloaded : bool
db:section.db:para: This property indicates whether this sample needs to be preloaded or not. If true, the audio engine will start loading the sample file immediately when the application starts, otherwise the sample will not be loaded until explicitly requested.

db:section.db:title: source : url
db:section.db:para: This property holds the source URL of the audio sample.

db:section.db:title: loadedChanged()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when loaded is changed.

db:section.db:title: void load()
db:section.db:para: Starts loading the sample into memory if not loaded.
